title: Tonari no Seki-kun
title_english: Tonari no Seki-kun: The Master of Killing Time
synopsis: The original manga revolves around a girl named Yokoi who sits next to a boy only known as Seki-kun. During class, Seki-kun continues to not pay attention and instead creates amazing little distractions, such as a detailed golf course with the course's hole being a dent in his desk, or an entire dramatic war being played out by paper shogi pieces. Yokoi often finds herself getting reluctantly interested in his games, even though they always seem to end up getting HER in trouble with the teacher! (Source: ANN)
background:
The first 13 episodes of Tonari no Seki-kun aired on TV (TV Tokyo), but the final 7 episodes were streamed online on  on April 7. Starting May 2 and over the course of 7 weeks, the same 7 episodes aired on TV (AT-X).
The series adapts content from the first 3 volumes of Takuma Morishige's manga series of the same title.
opening_themes: "Meiwaku Spectacle (迷惑スペクタクル)" by Kana Hanazawa
ending_themes: "Set Them Free" by Akira Jimbo (神保 彰) (eps 1-9, 11-21)
"Set Them Free 〜Another Version〜" by Akira Jimbo (神保 彰) (ep 10)
